name: Library
longDes: You have entered a library. Some chairs and small tables face windows on the South and West walls. Bookcases line the walls. The books appear mostly unremarkable, but there is one that looks odd - it has no markings but appears to be handbound. To the North is a door to a game room. The East door leads back to the foyer.
shortDes: You are in the mansion library. There are windows to the south and west. A door to the North leads to the game room. There is also a doorway to the East that leads back to the foyer.

startingItems.name: book
startingItems.description: The book falls open on a page that shows a white rose splattered in red. The other shows a gravestone.

features.name: bookcase
features.preActionDes: You see an oddly bound book on the shelf. It's upside down and has a strange binding.
features.inActionDes: You see an oddly bound book on the shelf. It's upside down and has a strange binding.
features.postActionDes: This is where you found the oddly bound book.

features.name: south window
features.preActionDes: You can see the porch from here.

features.name: west window
features.preActionDes: You look at the forest West of the house. It goes for miles.
